data.title: Research4Life R4L
data.meta_description: Research4Life provides institutions in lower and middle-income countries with online access to academic and professional peer-reviewed content. We aim to improve teaching, research and policy-making in health, agriculture, the environment and other life, physical and social sciences.National universities, professional schools, research institutes, teaching hospitals,  government offices, national libraries and NGOs in low- and middle-income countries are eligible to register to Research4Life.health, public health, medical literature, surgery, microbiology, mathematics, environment, environmental sciences, agriculture, veterinary, agricultural science,  animal sciences, neurosciences, scientific information, physics, law, international law, environmental law, labour law, labour law, social sciences, economics, sociology, psychiatry, history, philosophy, population studies, migration, political sciences, chemical technology, technical information, technology, computer science, engineering, electrical and nuclear engineering, academic publications, peer-reviewed, ebooks, peer-reviewed journals, scientific publications, databases, reference source.
data.text:
Use the filter facets to refine your search results (left of page on desktop or blue 'Filter' button at top of page on mobile).

To search with Summon use the search icon at the top of the page.
